text: @realDonaldTrump @MikeGarcia2020 @GavinNewsom Listen @Potus, you need to tax @GOP Republicans double this year!! You and them are causing deaths of thousands of Americans and you totally tanked the #economy.  You need to pay double our #health workers!! #COVID19 #coronavirus criminal negligence
